definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: She is the woman who killed her preacher husband in Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 之前她在田纳西州杀死了她的传道士丈夫。

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: The water ran for hours before the leak was found.
sentences.chinese: 漏洞发现之前，水已流了数小时。

sentences.english: It's edited by Jahan Ramazani, formerly a Teaching Fellow in this course.
sentences.chinese: 由之前的一个教学人员让，拉马扎尼所编。

sentences.english: It allows both partners to keep their virginity intact for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 它保证了伴侣双方初夜之前都是处子之身。

sentences.english: Test, tweak, rinse and repeat until you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在你成功之前，测试，调节，清理和重做。

sentences.english: The epidemic was stopped before the annual pilgrimage to Mecca got under way.
sentences.chinese: 这传染病在一年一度进行麦加朝圣之前停止。

sentences.english: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.chinese: 这件事的发生远在哥伦布到达美洲之前。

sentences.english: Then the nail must be straightened before it can be hammered into place correctly.
sentences.chinese: 于是在把钉子正确地钉入之前，需要先弄直它。

sentences.english: He needs to improve his English before he can study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他到国外念书之前必须先加强英文。

sentences.english: The agreement needed to be in place prior to commencing the work.
sentences.chinese: 协议需要在工作开始之前就到位。

sentences.english: It is right before tollgate entering Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 就在进入江苏省收费站之前。

sentences.english: The parameter values can also be derived from values in previous tasks in the workflow.
sentences.chinese: 这些参数值也可从工作流内之前的任务中获得。

sentences.english: In one case it began stretching its neck just before the food was delivered.
sentences.chinese: 有一次它在食物送到之前就拉长了脖子。

sentences.english: Before you drop the bafl into the spinntng well, you bet a number on the layout.
sentences.chinese: 在你把小球投入转盘之前，先在布局上赌个号码。

sentences.english: Because I diden't have enough, but now I do. the little boy replied.
sentences.chinese: 因为我之前不够，但我现在已经够了，小孩回答。

definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
